title: Shadowland: Thunderbolts TPB (Trade Paperback)
description: THE THUNDERBOLTS VS. THE AVENGERS! Luke Cage sends the Thunderbolts into the heart of Shadowland — where Daredevil has declared marshal law. While the battle for New York rages on, the T-Bolts head into the sewers to rescue innocent civilians. And when Juggernaut, Crossbones, Moonstone, Songbird, Ghost, Mach V, Fixer and Man-Thing run loose with no supervision, anything can happen! Then, the Avengers pays a visit to the Raft to evaluate the T-Bolts program — which leads to a brutal fight with Juggernaut, Ghost and Crossbones! Plus: the Ghost's never-before-revealed origin! Collecting THUNDERBOLTS #148-151.
